entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
